articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.title: After Spotify, Epic Games, Microsoft pans new Apple App Store rules! Know what they are saying - HT Tech
articles.description: Apple has announced new App Store rules for the European Union, but these have not been appreciated by Microsoft, Spotify, and Epic Games.
articles.content: Last week, Apple announced its new App Store rules after the European Union ordered it to change the way it carries on business in the region. While it allowed third-party apps for iPhones in the reg… [+2783 chars]
